thread.title: Naagin 2 Actress, Aashka Goradia, Ready To Tie The Knot In December
thread.title_full: Naagin 2 Actress, Aashka Goradia, Ready To Tie The Knot In December

title: Naagin 2 Actress, Aashka Goradia, Ready To Tie The Knot In December
text:
facebook 624 SHARES 
Last year, on Christmas Eve, actress Aashka Goradia broke the news of her engagement with American beau, Brent Goble. The duo is now planning a December wedding. Speaking to Times of India , the Naagin 2 actress said, "We wanted to get married in India, and the winters in our country are lovely. Brent's entire family will be flying down from the U.S. to solemnise the marriage. December is a special month for us, as that's when Brent had popped the question, so we zeroed in on the same month for our wedding as well." 
This is one winter wedding we are looking forward to, in 2017. Congratulations, guys.
